description: Dapr community and SDK metrics. This data gets updated twice a month.

targets.rawSql: SELECT member_count, collection_date FROM discord_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01 22:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT repo_name, collection_date, fork_count_total, star_count_total, commit_count, issue_count, pullrequest_count, distinct_user_count, collected_over_number_of_days FROM github_dapr WHERE repo_name = 'dapr' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 1000
SELECT collection_date, user_count FROM website_dapr ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 102

SELECT collection_date, repo_name, avg_weekly_issue_count, avg_weekly_comment_count, avg_weekly_commit_count, avg_weekly_pullrequest_count, avg_weekly_distinct_user_count FROM weekly_github_counts_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 1000

panels.title: GitHub stats for all dapr repos (weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, view_count FROM youtube_dapr ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 100
SELECT collection_date, download_count_increment, package_version FROM nuget_dapr_client_view WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 500
SELECT collection_date, avg_weekly_downloads, package_version FROM java_dapr_sdk_view WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 500

panels.title: Java SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, package_version, download_count FROM npm_dapr_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 500

panels.title: JavaScript SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

targets.rawSql: SELECT collection_date, download_count FROM python_dapr WHERE collection_date >= '2024-01-01 00:00:00.000' ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 500

panels.title: Python SDK downloads (all versions, weekly average)

title: Dapr stats
